description: A Gohma Queen was quite a monster to fight, but they were far from invulnerable. Particularly numerous hives would assure she was guarded at all times.
tooltip: A Gohma Queen was quite a monster to fight, but they were far from invulnerable. Particularly numerous hives would assure she was guarded at all times. (Gohma Queens are now followed by a host of Soldier Larva, boosting all of her stats)
